Size Guide

SizeChest (inches)Waist (inches)Length (inches)
Small34-3628-3026-28
Medium38-4032-3428-30
Large42-4436-3830-32
XL46-4840-4232-34

How to Measure

1

Chest

Measure around the fullest part of your chest

2

Waist

Measure around your natural waistline

3

Length

Measure from shoulder to desired hem length

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does delivery take?

Standard delivery takes 7-10 business days. Express delivery options are available for urgent orders.

What's the minimum order quantity?

We accept orders from single pieces to bulk team orders. Team discounts start from 5+ pieces.

Do you offer bulk discounts?

Yes! We offer tiered discounts for team orders. Contact us for custom pricing on large orders.

Can I return or exchange items?

We offer exchanges for sizing issues within 14 days. Custom printed items are non-returnable.
